gobblin.runtime.job_monitor

Class KafkaJobMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • gobblin.runtime.kafka.HighLevelConsumer<byte[],byte[]>
        • gobblin.runtime.job_monitor.KafkaJobMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, JobSpecMonitor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KafkaAvroJobMonitor

    public abstract class KafkaJobMonitor
extends HighLevelConsumer<byte[],byte[]>
implements JobSpecMonitor
    Abstract JobSpecMonitor that reads JobSpecs from a Kafka stream. Subclasses should implement parseJobSpec(byte[]) to transform the message into one or multiple JobSpecs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • parseJobSpec

        public abstract Collection<Either<JobSpec,URI>> parseJobSpec(byte[] message)
                                                      throws IOException
        Returns:
        A collection of either JobSpecs to add/update or URIs to remove from the catalog, parsed from the Kafka message.
        Throws:
        IOException

        Description copied from class: HighLevelConsumer
